title: Remove hero video, switch to Times New Roman italic typography, and update materials photos/labels

requirements.text: Remove all videos from the website UI, including replacing the Hero section
acceptanceCriteria: No <video> elements render in the UI (Hero and elsewhere).
The Hero media area displays a static image (using the existing hero poster/image asset) with the same responsive sizing and rounded/shadow styling.
No network request is made for "/assets/hero-handbag-model-video.mp4" during normal page load.

requirements.text: Update global typography so all visible text across the site uses the font family "Times New Roman" (fallback to "Times" and then generic serif) and remains italic by default.

quotes: please take font style TIMES NEW ROMAN - ITALIC styles for all text in it.

acceptanceCriteria: All major text elements (headings, paragraphs, navigation, buttons, form labels, footer) render with Times New Roman (or Times/serif fallback) and italic styling.
No immutable-path files are modified to accomplish this (use existing editable global CSS / Tailwind configuration).

requirements.text: Set the font size to 20px for the displayed phrase "Premium Ladies Handbag Manufacturer" in the Hero section (the heading text containing "Premium Ladies" and "Handbag Manufacturer").

quotes: please make font size 20 for mentioned 'Premium Ladies Handbag Manufacturer"

acceptanceCriteria: The Hero heading text "Premium Ladies" and "Handbag Manufacturer" renders at 20px (not responsive larger sizes) on both mobile and desktop.
Other Hero text (tagline, paragraph, buttons) keeps its current sizing unless explicitly required by this request.

requirements.text: In the Materials & Craftsmanship showcase (BagGallery), remove the existing Jacquard material card/image and replace it with the user-uploaded white towel bag photo, and display the label text exactly as "Towel bag" below/on the photo where the material name appears.

quotes: remove Jacquard bag photo and instead of that add attached white towel bag photo and mentioned Towel bag in below of bags photo.

acceptanceCriteria: The materials grid no longer shows the Jacquard card/image.
A new/updated card uses the uploaded image file "WhatsApp Image 2026-02-10 at 8.32.42 PM.jpeg" as its src (served as a static asset from frontend/public).
The visible name for that card is exactly "Towel bag" (English casing as shown).
The image has an appropriate English alt attribute describing the bag visually.

requirements.text: In the Materials & Craftsmanship showcase (BagGallery), remove the existing "Beads / Embroidery" material card/image and replace it with the user-uploaded beaded bag photo, and display the label text exactly as "Beaded Clutch" below/on the photo where the material name appears.

quotes: remove beads / embroidery bags photo and add attached beaded bag photo and mentioned Beaded Clutch in below of bags photo.

acceptanceCriteria: The materials grid no longer shows the "Beads / Embroidery" card/image.
A new/updated card uses the uploaded image file "Bg-02-8.jpg" as its src (served as a static asset from frontend/public).
The visible name for that card is exactly "Beaded Clutch".
The image has an appropriate English alt attribute describing the clutch visually.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or anything under frontend/src/components/ui.
Store and serve the two user-uploaded images as static frontend assets (under frontend/public) and reference them directly via their public /assets/... paths (no backend routing).
Use English for any user-facing text added/changed by these updates.
nonGoals: Backend changes (Motoko actor logic, storage, or APIs).
Adding new sections or features beyond removing videos, typography adjustments, and the requested materials image/label swaps.
Regenerating existing generated material images unless explicitly required.
